ingredients.content: 200 gram carrots, cut into pieces (2 cm)
200 g red peppers, cut into pieces (3 cm)
200 g broccoli, cut into florets, plus stems sliced (0,5 cm)
160 g apples, stems removed, cut into quarters
¼ tsp freshly ground black pepper

preparations.content: Place carrots, red peppers, broccoli, apples and sunflower seeds into mixing bowl.
Add olive oil, lemon juice, honey, mustard, salt and pepper and mix <b>5 sec/speed 4.5<b>. Serve immediately for freshest flavor.
